name: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
author: Choi Seung
content: Damien Haksen was once a gifted warrior with a bright future, but everything changed when a powerful Archlich twisted him into a Death Knight. Controlled by dark magic, he murdered his own family and helped destroy a kingdom. He broke free at the very end — too late to undo the damage. But fate gave him one more chance.Now back in the past, Damien is determined to protect the people he once lost and destroy the dark mages who turned his life into a nightmare. This time, he’ll fight not for glory
